description:
Giselle`s Graveler was sent out to battle Misty`s Starmie even though she knew it would have a type disadvantage. She wanted to show everyone that depending on the levels, it should be able to win.
After a quick battle, it was able to defend against Starmie`s water attacks and smash it through the window and into the nearby pool, thereby winning the battle.
name: Golone (Seiyo)
